items.name: Heritage Park
items.description: A beautiful 50-acre park featuring walking trails, picnic areas, and a historic village.

items.name: Downtown Plaza
items.description: The heart of our city with shops, restaurants, and frequent community events.

items.name: Riverwalk Trail
items.description: Scenic 3-mile paved trail following the river with beautiful views and wildlife.

items.name: Community Arts Center
items.description: Hosting art exhibits, theater productions, and music performances year-round.

items.name: Farmers Market
items.description: Open every Saturday with local produce, crafts, and food vendors.

items.name: Historical Museum
items.description: Explore our town's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

items.name: Lakeview Recreation Area
items.description: Boating, fishing, and swimming at our pristine 200-acre lake.

items.name: Botanical Gardens
items.description: 12 themed gardens showcasing native and exotic plant species.
